recommended_degree: Manajemen, Manajemen Bisnis, Teknik Industri, Teknik Mesin (Sarjana)
job_title: Intern Sales Strategy and Marketing Intelligence
job_description:
The Sales Strategy & Market Intelligence Intern supports SKF Indonesia in sharpening its go-to-market strategy against key competitors (Schaeffler, Timken and others) by turning market, customer, and distributor data into clear insights and practical recommendations. The role will help map Indonesia’s bearings and industrial motion landscape, analyse competitor positioning by segment (mining, cement, energy, automotive, general industry), and assess how effectively SKF is playing inside multi-brand distributors.
Working closely with the Sales, Operations, Strategy Technology Development, PX and Finance teams, this intern will build and maintain simple dashboards on sales performance, share of wallet and distributor productivity, structure competitor and market intelligence into Board-ready summaries, and provide analytical support for organizational design and vertical sales initiatives (e.g. Mining & Metals, Cement & Aggregates, Energy, Automotive Aftermarket).
Ultimately, this role exists to give management a fact-based view of “where to win and how to win” in Indonesia, so that SKF can close the gap with competitors and grow profitably through better decisions on segments, distributors, and sales organisation design.
